thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com
thread.title: Teresa
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Teresa

author: Teresa
title: Teresa
text:
Used this company for the first time and they were Wonderful! Sent a Birthday cake and cookies to my Dad in NY, he was thrilled with all of it. My Mom said the package it came in was beautiful and my Dad started to eat the cookies immediately:). I live in South Carolina snd didn't get to try any of it, but the feedback from my parents and siblings was crazy! They each called me saying they were going to use you
For future holidays or birthdays. Matter of fact I will be using you again for my sister-in-laws birthday
Next month.
Thank you for making my gift giving from afar so much easier!!
